item.title: Neovim terminal fun
item.description: Neovim is Vim’s forked cousin that aims to replace it by providing additional features and refactoring Vim’s old code base. One of the cool stuff that comes with Neovim is its integrated terminal emulator. In this short blog post I will share how I use Neovim’s terminal and how you can configure it to make it easier to use. First install Neovim on your system, for that follow the official guide instructions here.
